title: Air Quality and Pollutant Levels in Major German Cities, 2024
description: This dataset contains hourly measurements of PM2.5, NO2, and O3 levels from monitoring stations in Berlin, Hamburg, Munich, and Cologne for the year 2024.
method: Data was collected using calibrated TEI 49i Ozone Analyzers and GRIMM EDM180 environmental dust monitors. All data underwent a quality control process to remove outliers caused by sensor malfunctions.

title: Survey Data on Remote Work Preferences in the EU Post-2023
description: Anonymized responses from a survey of 15,000 workers across the European Union regarding preferences for remote, hybrid, and in-office work models. Data collected in Q2 2025.
method: A stratified sampling method was used to ensure representation across member states, age groups, and economic sectors. The survey was administered online via the LimeSurvey platform.

title: Genomic Sequences of Antibiotic-Resistant E. coli Strains
creator_affiliation: Max Planck Institute for Infection Biology
description: Whole-genome sequencing data (FASTA files) for 50 strains of multidrug-resistant Escherichia coli isolated from clinical settings in Europe.
method: DNA was extracted using the Qiagen DNeasy Blood & Tissue Kit. Sequencing was performed on an Illumina NovaSeq 6000 platform, and genomes were assembled using SPAdes v3.15.
